title.rendered: Cheap Samsung Galaxy S8 deals with free gifts

content.rendered:
Cheap Samsung Galaxy S8 deals with free gifts

Here at Fonehouse we have always provided our customers with the best quality handsets for the best prices ensuring that you get an amazing deal for your next smartphone contract, and now our deals have gotten even better as we are offering a free gift with certain Samsung Galaxy S8 contracts. There are a wide range of different tariffs available with a choice of four different gifts so don’t miss out, check out our deals now!

Why you should choose the Samsung Galaxy S8

Although it may not be the newest Samsung handset available the Galaxy S8 is still a very desirable smartphone packed with amazing features, powerful performance, and Androids renowned user friendly software. The S8’s beautifully sleek design features an AMOLED super high resolution 5.8 inch display and an impressive 12MP rear facing camera – enough to rival even the newest handsets on the market. And with a 3000mAh battery offering up to 20 hours of talk time you can be sure that the Samsung Galaxy S8 will be able to keep up with you throughout the day.

Get a Samsung Galaxy S8 with a free PlayStation Classic

For those of you that remember the original PlayStation Sony have now released the PlayStation Classic. With the same iconic design but at 45% the size the PlayStation Classic comes preloaded with 20 of the most popular games of the era for you to enjoy alone or with a friend. And, now with some of our best deals yet, you can get yourself the PlayStation Classic for free with a Samsung Galaxy S8 contract!Our best deal offers the PlayStation Classic for free with a £33 per month Samsung Galaxy S8 contract offering 30GB of data, unlimited minutes and texts, and even £72 cashback!

Get the S8 with a free 1TB Xbox One S

With the release of the Xbox One S Microsoft have provided their most powerful console yet. With over 1,300 games available from the latest releases to three generations of fan favourites you are sure to find something to enjoy playing. And, best of all, the Xbox One S is backwards compatible so you can relive some of your favourite games in 4K Ultra HD quality. With some of our best deals you can now get a 1TB Xbox One S with a Samsung Galaxy S8 contract!You can now get yourself the Xbox One S for free with a Samsung Galaxy S8 contract offering a generous 30GB of data, unlimited minute and texts, and we’ll even give you £96 cashback!

A free PS4 with Fifa 19 when you buy a Samsung Galaxy S8

For four generations Sony have been providing some of the best gaming consoles available. Their PS4 exceeded all expectations with its release, and with access to thousands of games from classic favourites to the biggest new releases, and even some PlayStation exclusives, Sony have provided a gaming console that all can enjoy. With our amazing new deals you can now get yourself the world’s best-selling console with Fifa 19 for free with a Samsung Galaxy S8 contract!The best deal gets you the amazing Sony PS4 for free with a £45 per month Samsung Galaxy S8 contract that comes with 30GB of data, unlimited minutes and texts, and a huge £192 cashback!

Get a Nintendo Switch free with a Galaxy S8 contract

The Nintendo Switch has revolutionised console gaming and there has never been a better time to experience this amazing console for yourself. With the ability to be a stand-alone console, a portable gaming device, and seamlessly switch between solo and cooperative gameplay the Nintendo Switch is the easiest way to enjoy a wide range of Nintendo games competitively with friends or on your own all from the same device. And, you can now experience this extraordinary new console for free with the purchase of a Samsung Galaxy S8!With our best deal we will give you the Nintendo Switch for free with the purchase of a £45.50 per month Samsung Galaxy S8 contract that will get you 30GB of data, unlimited minutes and texts, and £180 cashback!
